title: Ep37: Living as a Trans-Man
itunes:title: Ep37: Living as a Trans-Man
description:
As requested, the duo are joined in the studio by Rush LDN, a trans-man. This week's episode gets down to the tough questions many of us have about the transgender community and living in today's society. The discussion takes a chronological approach to the changes in a one's life in undergoing transition. In this case, it's a woman who has fully transitioned into a married, straight man. Don't forget to follow us on IG @whoreible_decisions and email us your HOEmail at whoreibledecisions@gmail.com We'd like to thank EACH and every single one of you who are planning to attend the live show Friday, December 1st in NYC! We are truly excited to meet you all! We are also, NOW ON PATREON! To receive bonus episodes, video footage, and more, become a PATRON today! Visit patreon.com/whoreibledecisions for more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
